response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, which I am confident will significantly enhance your endeavors and bring about substantial benefits, is priced at $1,100,000. Given its intrinsic worth of $1,200,000 to you, this offer represents an exceptional chance to secure it at a competitive price. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together to achieve mutual success.", "product_price": 1100000}
